title: Font used for Cereal packaging
content:
Hi,

Would someone please be able to identify the font used on the red background please ('Enjoy a nutritious breakfast...')

Many thanks

Scott

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cereal_packaging_5747.jpg)

Font: 

 St Ryden (custom version) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061034/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: designmatic

comments.content:
Thanks for your help - it's really close to Sauna and I could always use that as an alternative

Kind regards

Scott
Custom version of [St Ryde](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061034/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stereotypes/st-ryde) by Sasha Timplan for Kellogg's
